sqlMap.select: SELECT NO, BOARD_NO, CONTENT, USER_NO, USER_NAME, TO_CHAR (REG_DATE, 'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS REG_DATE, GROUP_NO, ORDER_NO, DEPTH FROM REPLY WHERE BOARD_NO=#NO# ORDER BY group_no ASC, order_no ASC, REG_DATE DESC
sqlMap.insert: insert into reply (NO, BOARD_NO, CONTENT, USER_NO, USER_NAME, REG_DATE, GROUP_NO, ORDER_NO, DEPTH ) VALUES(seq_reply.nextval, #boardNo#, #content#, #userNo#, #userName#, sysdate, (select max(group_no+1) from reply), 0 ,0)
